description:
Once again, Bunji Man is out on patrol to protect the peace of the neighborhood; A huge dog and Mizunu-Man appear as well. Fumi is playing with her three favorite dolls. This leads Mom to search all over the house...; Bunji is on a field trip to visit the fire station. Bunji is sad that he lost rock-paper-scissors and will not be allowed to be on the hook-and-ladder truck. He ends up being oddly shown around by a high-tension fireman...; Bunji has to write an observation journal over winter break. He decides that he`s not going to tell Mom what he`s writing about. Bunji is praised for his observation journal after winter break ends. It seems he was writing about Mom...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Go Go Bunji Man 3 / Little Pu, Little Pi / Public Field Trip / Observation Journal
いけいけブンジマン3 / ぷーちゃん, ぴーちゃん / 社会見学 / かんさつ日記
